alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 2:57AM CDT until March 27 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At Wadley affecting Tallapoosa, Randolph and Chambers Counties. .Heavy rainfall of 2 to 4 inches has occurred over the past 24 hours over the Tallapoosa River Basin basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tallapoosa River Basin. Another statement will be issued by this afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At Wadley. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if higher stages are forecast. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 13.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage by this afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
